## SHARK, MEGALODON

![](images/shark-megalodon.webp)

_Primordial sharks the size of whales. Savage hunters._

**AC** 13, **HP** 38, **ATK** 3 bite +7 (2d8), **MV** double near (swim), **S** +5 **D** +1 **C** +2 **I** -3 **W** +1 **Ch** -3, **AL** N, **LV** 8

**Fearless:** Immune to morale checks.
